JobDescription:
-Overview:

MountBlue is a premium services provider and is looking for smart and motivated programmers to join their team. The candidate must have programming experience in at least one of the following languages: Javascript, Java, Python, PHP, Ruby, C or C++. Selected candidates will go through an extensive 12-13 weeks training program and on successfully completing the requirements of the program will be offered the role of a Software Development Engineer


-Responsibilities:

1. Work in a team to develop, compile, test, debug & deploy software
2. Develop web and mobile applications using Javascript, Python, Java, HTML and CSS
3. Ensure close to 100% timely & defect-free software deployments
4. Write documentation for the software and APIs
5. Support software during production and provide hot fixes


-Qualifications:
1. Familiarity with at least one programming language. Example: Javascript, Java, PHP or Python
2. Good analytical and problem solving skills
3. Self-motivated with ability to work in a fast-paced environment
4. Excellent verbal and written communication skills
5. Eagerness to learn new technologies


-Benefits:
1. Perfect launchpad for a high flying career in technology
2. You will get the opportunity to interact with and learn from the CTOs and Directors of 
Engineering of leading technology startups in India
Author: aniketdgp

JobDescription:
WHO WE NEED:


-GRADUATE TRAINEES

Graduates who join us will have the opportunity to work at the heart of our business, helping to ensure the continuing high performance of our core trading systems. You will contribute to a range of creative projects encompassing the full breadth of modern software engineering,supported by our teams of expert engineers.


-WHAT YOU'LL DO:

Work on state-of-the-art monitoring systems and enhance their capabilities
Find and implement smart ways to reduce the cost of development operations
Build integration APIs
Build tools to simplify and streamline development operations
Work with a global team across London, Krakow, and Bangalore


-WHAT YOU'LL LEARN:

1. Practical skills to build web applications, Eg: Design patterns, Java 8, Spring, Tomcat, GIT and Front end technologies; javascript frameworks Agile and lean development
2. Automated testing
3. Continuous delivery
4. Low-latency and high-throughput distributed architectures.
5. Monitoring
6. Modern software engineering and operations
7. What it takes to create a reliable software
8. Troubleshooting complex problems
9. About IGs business, clients,, and financial trading


-YOU'LL BE:

1. Passionate about technology and eager to learn
2. Analytical
3. A problem solver


-YOU'LL HAVE:

1. Skills in developing Java Web applications
2. Basic understanding of Linux operating systems
3. Basic understanding of TCP/IP


-Eligibility criteria:

1. B.E/B.tech in Electrical/Electronics/Mechnical/Computer science/Information science any stream with CGPA of 7.0 and above throughout the academics in 2020/2021 with no backlogs.
2. A strong English-language communicator (B2 level preferably)


-Interview Process:

Coding Assessment along with puzzles followed up 3 rounds of technical interviews .


-Work time and Work location:

Domlur, Bengaluru.
5 days/week
9.5h/day


-IG Workforce:

1. 200+ employees in Bangalore
2. 1500+ employees globally
3. Skills in developing Java Web applications
4. Basic understanding of Linux operating systems
5. Basic understanding of TCP/IP
Author: aniketdgp

JobDescription:
BluJay focus on bringing the right candidate on-board and encouraging them to use the latest technologies for identifying key talents. We invite young generation to join our team and be part of our growth story.
BluJay hires freshers those are highly motivated to become software engineers and already have developed an understanding to develop Web applications independently.

-Eligibility Criteria:
1. BE/B.Tech( Computer Science and Information Science/Technology) and MCA
Only 2021 pass out 
2. Minimum 70% and above throughout Academics    

-CTC:
4.5 LPA for FTE ; during first 3 Months -Stipend is 20 K to 25 K

-Selection Process:
1. Online Test 
2. Technical Interview
3. HR Discussion

-Job Type: 
3 months Internship and post-assessment based on the performance convert to full time employment

-Service Bond:
No

-Technical Skills
1. Java
2. SQL 

-Essential Skills:
1. Write the code and debugging programs
2. Highly motivated and demonstrating a strong drive for results
3. Consistently demonstrates creativity necessary to solve problems
4. Highly organized and detail oriented
5. Able to communicate well with others
6. Hard working, logical and Smart thinking
7. Basic understanding of Software develop

-Desired Skills:
1. Any Java JEE technology stack
2. Understanding on Agile development process

-Physical Requirements:
1. General office environment and responsibilities requiring:
2. Extensive use of the computer which involves viewing a monitor and keyboarding for most of the workday
3. Placing and receiving phone calls

-NOTE:
1. Online test date and time will be updated to the registered candidates 
2. After test, shortlisted candidates must be available for a further online interview proces
3. Candidates should be available for immediate joining
Author: aniketdgp

JobDescription:
Develop, test and implement new software programs.

1. Write clean and efficient code.
2. Prototype and develop scalable and reliable mobile applications
3. Troubleshoot, debug and maintain the existing software programs.
4. Monitor the quality, performance and usage of the developed functionalities in the applications.
5. Work closely with other developers, designers and support representatives to manage and enhance the applications.


Interview Process:

The entire process will include 5 rounds. All the rounds will be conducted online. Round 2-5 will be conducted using video conferencing


You will need:

1. A laptop/computer with front camera and mic
2. Good internet connectivity


Note:

1. Shortlisted candidates will be informed via email.
2. More details regarding the next rounds will be sent in the call letter.


Please do not apply if:

You’ve attended a written test or interviewed at Zoho anytime in the last 3 months.
You’re a student and graduating in 2022.
Author: aniketdgp

JobDescription:
Eligibility

•  Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Engineering degree in Computer Science or Information Science
•  CGPA of 8.0 (out of 10) and above
•  Excellent written and verbal communication skills. Must be fluent in English.
•  Ability to simply and effectively communicate complex technical concepts to stakeholders


What you will do ?

• Performs IT functions such as design, analysis, evaluation, testing, debugging, implementation/integration and operations of new tools, systems or 3rd party products/platforms to deliver or provide updates to business processes and operations on Enterprise Security related products and capabilities.

• Specify, build, maintain and support Enterprise Security products/capabilities. Analyzes, installs, acquires, modifies, and supports operating systems, platforms, directory services, authentication services and software services.

• Focused on configuring, installing, upgrading, monitoring, and scripting of existing Enterprise Security platforms/capabilities and applications (3rd party, home-grown, on-prem, cloud, etc.) to get the desired performance required.

Stakeholders

• Strong problem-solving instincts and abilities

• Attentive to detail

• Proficient in general security concepts like Cyber Security, Directory Services, 
  Authentication Services, Security Intelligence, Forensics etc..

• Familiar with general networking capabilities like IP Address Management, Routing, 
  Switching, Gateways, DNS, Load Balancing, Firewalls, etc..

• Familiar with standard programming languages (Linux, C,C++, Python), scripting and
